text: Somewhere in the middle of his mind and tried to find somewhere to settle down and find herself a steady era that young lady does. #MostlyHarmless

passages.fragment: in the middle of his mind and
passages.full_quote: He needed a sense of purpose in life, which was why he had turned to astrology to fill the yawning gulf that existed <used>in the middle of his mind and</used> soul

passages.fragment: of his mind and tried to
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: He wished the dark, locked off section of his two brains would go away because they occasionally surfaced momentarily and put strange thoughts into the light, fun sections <used>of his mind and tried to</used> deflect him from what he saw as being the basic business of his life, which was to have a wonderfully good time

passages.fragment: his mind and tried to find somewhere to settle down and
passages.full_quote: For a few seconds he sat in stunned silence as the images rushed around <used>his mind and tried to find somewhere to settle down and</used> make sense

passages.fragment: to settle down and find herself a steady era that young lady does
passages.full_quote: She wants <used>to settle down and find herself a steady era that young lady does</used>
